mapper.update: update MemberInfo set userpw=#{userPw}, username=#{userName}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} , zipCode=#{zipCode}, phone=#{phone}, gradenum=#{gradeNum}, point=#{point}, useramount=#{userAmount} where userid=#{userId}
mapper.select: select mm.userId, mm.userName, mm.gradeNum, mm.point, mm.userAmount, oo.orderDetailNum, oo.payment, oo.orderTime, oo.totalAmount from SB_Master.MemberInfo mm, SB_Master.OrderDetail oo where mm.userSeq = oo.userSeq and mm.userId=${userId};
